name: Massive Scordite
description: Massive Scordite was the stuff of legend in the early days of space exploration, due to a 10% higher mineral yield than standard scordite. Though it has long since been taken over in value by other ores it still has a special place in the hearts of veteran miners. Scordite is amongst the most common ore types in the central regions of known universe. It has a fair bit of Tritanium and Pyerite. Good choice for those starting their mining careers. Available primarily in high security status star systems.
